description: Smallest composite x such that sigma(x+2^n) = sigma(x) + 2^n.
comments: The sequence is initiated by smallest of A015915. Special primes of A023202, A049488-A049491 also satisfy the Sigma[p+2^w]=Sigma[p]+2^w relation
prog: (PARI) a(n)=my(N=2^n,x=3); while(isprime(x++) || sigma(x+N) != sigma(x)+N,); x \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 11 2014
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 29 2000
extensions: a(21) corrected and a(27)-a(33) from _Donovan Johnson_, Nov 30 2008
